govtJob.jobDescription: Gujarat Narmada Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. invites application for the post of Office Secretarial (On Contract) (1 Post) - MP - 225. Incumbent should be qualified Company Secretary (CS) with CS membership number from ICSI. Experience : Minimum 3 to 5 Years of Post Qualification Experience from Listed Companies (excluding Internship/Training). Age : 30 - 35 Years. Role, Responsibilities and Skills required for post are as shown on our website.
govtJob.CompanyName: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd.
govtJob.companyDetails: Gujarat Narmada Valley Fertilizers & Chemicals Ltd. (GNFC) is India's leading Company with ambitious expansion plans. The Company currently has turnover of more than Rs. 6000 Crore.
govtJob.applicationDetails: Please visit our website http://www.gnfc.in/career.html for further details and Apply online within 10 days.

govtJob.jobDescription: Online applications are invited from SC, ST, OBC, EWS and PWD under Special drive from India nationals for the posts of Assistant Professor in the Departments of Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Architecture & Planning.
govtJob.companyDetails: National Institute of Technology Patna is the 18th National Institute of Technology created by the Ministry of H.R.D. Government of India after rechristening the erstwhile Bihar College of Engineering Patna on 28. 01. 2004.
govtJob.applicationDetails: For detailed information, please visit Institute website www.nitp.ac.in.

govtJob.jobDescription: HPCL requires Fixed Term Research Associates(FTRA) (Ph.D/M.tech) for its HP Green R&D Centre, Bengaluru. Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd., A Maharatna Company, plans to engage Fixed Term Research Associates and Fixed Term Project Associates at Its HP Green R & D Centre Bengaluru to assist in various research projects of the Corporation.
govtJob.companyDetails: HPCL is committed to conducting business with an objective of preserving the environment, sustainable development, being a safe work place and enrichment of the quality of life of employees, customers and the community.
govtJob.applicationDetails: For details and to apply online, visit our Website: www.hindustanpetroleum.com. Commencement of online application from 11-10-2021. Last date for applying online is 31-10-2021.

govtJob.jobDescription: Pipelines Division of Indian Oil Corporation Limited invites applications from eligible Indian Nationals for engagement of about 469 numbers of Technician Apprentices (Diploma holders in Engineering Mech/Elec/T&I) and Trade Apprentices(Assistant HR, Accountant, Data Entry Operator, Domestic Data Entry Operator) in states of Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Odisha, Chattisgarh, Jharkhand, West Bengal, Bihar, Assam, Uttar Pradesh, Gujarat, Rajasthan, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab, Delhi and Uttrakhand. Out of 469 seats, tentatively, the following reservation shall be provided SC-62, ST-34, OBC-96, EWS-39, PwBD-19. However, for exact number of vacancies & reservation, please refer to our detailed website notification at www.iocl.com or https://plapps.indianoil.in. Rate of stipend payable to apprentices per month shall be as prescribed under Apprentices Act, 1961/1973 /Apprentices Rules 1992 (as amended) and Corporation's guidelines. Selection process would consist of Written Test. The age of the candidates should be minimum 18 years and maximum 24 years as on cut-off date for eligibility which is 01.10.2021. IOCL will have no obligation to offer regular employment to apprentices. The last date for submission of online application at https://plapps.indianoil.in is 25.10.2021 by 1800 hrs.
govtJob.companyDetails: A diversified, integrated energy major with presence in almost all the streams of oil, gas, petrochemicals and alternative energy sources; a world of high-calibre people, state-of-the-art technologies and cutting-edge R&D; a world of best practices, quality-consciousness and transparency; and a world where energy in all its forms is tapped most responsibly and delivered to the consumers most affordably.
govtJob.applicationDetails: All future announcements shall be published only in IOCL website at www.iocl.com and at https://plapps.indianoil.in. It shall not be made available on any other website/ medium. Candidates are advised to visit IOCL website from time to time for updates on the above notification. Any discrepancy/ambiguity in the notification, on account of interpretation of Hindi & other Regional languages version, contents enumerated in English version of website notification in Indian Oil website www.iocl.com shall prevail.

govtJob.jobDescription: IFCI Infrastructure Development Ltd. (a Government of India Undertaking) requires staff on contractual basis. Eligible candidates are advised to apply for the mentioned vacancy. No. of Vacancy - 01. Place of Posting - IIDL Suites, Mayur Vihar, New Delhi.

govtJob.applicationDetails: For any information, please contact HR Department at 011-47668899/ 41732277. Last date for submission of application is October 20, 2021. Further, reference is invited to our advertisement dated 22.09.2021 published in Times Ascent for the position of Chief Finance Officer, Financial Controller & Front Office Manager. The date for submission of application has been extended till 20.10.2021.

govtJob.jobDescription: Gujarat Industries Power Co. ltd. engaged in the business of power generation from lignite, gas and renewable energy require DGM /Sr. Manager (HR&A) at Corporate Office at Vadodara.
govtJob.companyDetails: The company is engaged in the business of Electrical Power Generation with a present installed generation capacity of 1184.4 MW. The Company has a diversified portfolio of Thermal (Gas and Lignite), Wind and Solar Power Plant Assets in the state of Gujarat. GIPCL aims to transform itself into a formidable national level power sector enterprise.
govtJob.applicationDetails: For more details and how to apply, please log on to www.gipcl.com.

internationalJob.jobDescription: Applications are invited for the post of Site Engineer (Civil) for Paradeep (Odisha) & Egypt, minimum 6 years’ experience.

We are looking for an experienced Hospital Administration Manager to run our In-school medical facility. To be successful in this role, you should have a deep understanding of all administrative hospital procedures, from creating work schedules and communicating with doctors to budgeting and maintaining supplies stock. You will use your organizational & leadership skills to supervise employees and ensure compliance with policies & regulations. Requirements & skills : BS degree in Healthcare Administration, Business Administration or relevant field. Proven work experience as a Hospital Administration Manager, Medical officer Manager or similar role. Knowledge of medical terminology and hospital industry. Excellent leadership, organizational, management, and communication skills. Responsibilities : Developing solid Health-Business IMPACT BASED strategies to improve business at large. Supervise daily administrative operations. Develop & implement effective policies for all operational procedures. Answer queries from doctors, nurses & healthcare staff. Resolve potential issues with patients.
internationalJob.applicationDetails: Interested candidates can send their resume to: chairman@imperial.ac.tz on or before 5th February-2023 at 17:00 local hours. Selected candidates will be contacted for the interview at JW Marriott Mumbai, Juhu on 8 Feb. 2023 from 10:30am.

jobsIndia.jobDescription: Applications are invited from dynamic, effective and experienced eligible retired Officers from Central Government Ministries/ Departments, Army, Navy, Airforce, BRO (GREF), Autonomous Bodies, Public Sector Undertakings, State Government Departments and State Government Public Undertakings on Engagement on Contract basis. Short Service Commission Officers (SSCO) who have been released from the Armed Forces or are likely to be released in next three months are also encouraged to apply. The Terms & Conditions for Engagement/ Deputation are as indicated below:- (T/P) [Regional Offices of NHIDCL located in North Eastern States, A&N Islands etc.]. Pay Matrix Level in CDA pattern: Pay Matrix Level-11 of 7th CPC [Pre-revised PB - 3 of Rs.15,600- 39,100/- plus Grade Pay of Rs.6,600/]. The number of vacancies in the Posts may vary, depending upon the requirement.
jobsIndia.CompanyName: National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited
jobsIndia.companyDetails: National Highways & Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited has been set up by the Government of India as a Corporation under the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways to fast pace construction/ up-gradation/widening of National Highways in the North-Eastern Region and areas that share International boundaries with neighboring countries.
jobsIndia.applicationDetails: Further, NHIDCL reserves the right to prepare Panels (one for Roads Sector and another for Infrastructure Sector) of selected Candidates for filling up the indicated and future vacancies that may arise in NHIDCL. Panel would be valid for a period of 12 months, unless further extended. Last date for submission of Application: 16.12.2020 (Wednesday) up to 18.00 hrs. For detailed Terms and Conditions please visit-www.nhidcl.com. NOTE 1: Officers presently serving in the Central Government Ministries/ Departments, Army, Navy, Airforce, Autonomous Bodies, Public Sector Undertakings, State Government Departments and State Government Public Undertakings and satisfying the prescribed eligibility criteria may also apply for the post on Deputation basis in the prescribed proforma along with copy of ACRs/APARs for last five years, No Objection Certificate (NOC) and Vigilance Clearance (VC). Those applying for appointment on deputation basis can be of any age. Subsequent to their retirement they may be allowed to continue in NHIDCL on contract basis subject to both party agreeing to it. If their parent organisation need them to revert back for retirement formalities, they may be allowed to do so fora period up to one week Thereafter they can continue on contract basis on the terms and conditions applicable to Contract employees. NOTE 2: Any change or amendment in this Vacancy Circular will be posted on the NH IDCL Website only. NOTE 3: Incomplete applications or those received after the prescribed date shall be summarily rejected.

jobsIndia.jobDescription: Applications are invited from dynamic, effective and experienced eligible retired Officers from Central Government Ministries/ Departments, Army, Navy, Airforce, BRO (GREF), Autonomous Bodies, Public Sector Undertakings, State Government Departments and State Government Public Undertakings on Engagement on Contract basis. Short Service Commission Officers (SSCO) who have been released from the Armed Forces or are likely to be released in next three months are also encouraged to apply. The Terms & Conditions for Engagement/ Deputation are as indicated below:- (T/P) [Regional Offices of NHIDCL located in North Eastern States, A&N Islands etc.]. Pay Matrix Level in CDA pattern: Pay Matrix Level-12 of 7th CPC [Pre-revised PB - 3 of Rs.15,600- 39,100/- plus Grade Pay of Rs.7,600/-].
jobsIndia.CompanyName: National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited
jobsIndia.companyDetails: National Highways & Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited has been set up by the Government of India as a Corporation under the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways to fast pace construction/ up-gradation/widening of National Highways in the North-Eastern Region and areas that share International boundaries with neighboring countries.
jobsIndia.applicationDetails: Further, NHIDCL reserves the right to prepare Panels (one for Roads Sector and another for Infrastructure Sector) of selected Candidates for filling up the indicated and future vacancies that may arise in NHIDCL. Panel would be valid for a period of 12 months, unless further extended. Last date for submission of Application: 16.12.2020 (Wednesday) up to 18.00 hrs. For detailed Terms and Conditions please visit-www.nhidcl.com. NOTE 1: Officers presently serving in the Central Government Ministries/ Departments, Army, Navy, Airforce, Autonomous Bodies, Public Sector Undertakings, State Government Departments and State Government Public Undertakings and satisfying the prescribed eligibility criteria may also apply for the post on Deputation basis in the prescribed proforma along with copy of ACRs/APARs for last five years, No Objection Certificate (NOC) and Vigilance Clearance (VC). Those applying for appointment on deputation basis can be of any age. Subsequent to their retirement they may be allowed to continue in NHIDCL on contract basis subject to both party agreeing to it. If their parent organisation need them to revert back for retirement formalities, they may be allowed to do so fora period up to one week Thereafter they can continue on contract basis on the terms and conditions applicable to Contract employees. NOTE 2: Any change or amendment in this Vacancy Circular will be posted on the NH IDCL Website only. NOTE 3: Incomplete applications or those received after the prescribed date shall be summarily rejected.

jobsIndia.jobDescription: Eligible candidates who are domicile of West Bengal/Bihar/Odisha/Chhattisgarh/ Jharkhand/Andaman & Nicobar or Sikkim, to fill up the post of Assistant Office at various airports in the states in Eastern Region of AAI.
jobsIndia.applicationDetails: The details will be published in the Employment News on 03.11.2018 and also available in the AAI website i.e. http://www.aai.aero-Careers from 05.11.2018, 10.00 AM onwards.
